I have attended the RES course with RCN by Kent Soo. Kent is an outstanding instructor. He is sharp, detailed, and explains complex RES concepts in a way thatâ€™s easy to understand. Even after the course ended, he remained approachable and responded quickly to my questions. His dedication and helpful nature make him a truly great teacher. I highly recommend anyone considering the RES course to learn from Kent!
One tip i can share with student taking RES exam, never give up, read thru the notes, do all the questions book. You will sure to pass! All the best!

Hurray!!! I couldn't hold my excitement for one time passed.

First of all, I would like to thank Real Centre Network TAMPINES for providing such a confident RES course. I am also thankful that Mr. Kent Soo is so generous in his presentation styles. The willingness to help students make me feel touching. He is a very experienced lecturer and RES. Through his experience in the Real Estate industry, he can tell us more practical knowledge and expertise. Hopefully, RCN TAMPINES can retain such a good lecturer to teach more future RES.

One more person to thanks is Serene. Serene can manage all kinds of problems I face before and after courses as a dedicated and meticulous individual. Serene is friendly and helpful.

Thank you RCN TAMPINES again!!! :)

I took the RES course in January and was lucky to get an OTP. Thank you Kent, Moses and Dr Boaz for the commitment and sharing! Moses and Dr Boaz are grounded and knowledgeable. Kent is the coolest and most inspiring mentor ever. RCN provided me with a flexible schedule and appreciate Serene for that! Both of my tutors were exceptionally good and helpful. For P1 Dr Boaz Boon taught extremely well by giving interesting case studies & Mr. Kent Soo taught P2 with more examples and was quite energetic and helpful.
